response.overview: To test its top-secret Human Hibernation Project, the Pentagon picks the most average Americans it can find - an Army private and a prostitute - and sends them to the year 2505 after a series of freak events. But when they arrive, they find a civilization so dumbed-down that they're the smartest people around.
response.tagline: In the future, intelligence is extinct.
response.title: Idiocracy

cast.name: Terry Crews
cast.character: President Dwayne Elizondo Mountain Dew Herbert Camacho
